content: blossom by blossom the spring begins **algernon charles swinburne** **first spring hue shawl** is inspired by early spring which signifies optimism and creativity daffodils marigold yellow tulips and calandula are the most prominent flowers blooming in this season their yellow hue uplifts our souls with energy enthusiasm brings cheerfulness into our hearts **construction** it is a crescent shaped top down shawl begins with garter tab co this is airy classy elegant and easy to knit shawl with only one skein of yarn first spring hue shawl is a pleasure to work on a relaxing garter sttich followed by lace sections which creates a rhythm beaded picot bind off is enhancing it s beauty beads are optional **skill level**- intermediate **size**- wingspan 50 and 15 deep after blocking size is adaptable by working more row of garter st and 1-2 repeats of lace section **yarn** the sample shawl is knitted with only 1 skein of yarn 100 g / 273 yards in two tonal dk weight viscose yarn but it will look beautiful in solid colour and in lace fingering weight yarns too needles gauge and beads will vary with yarn weight **circular knitting needles**- 4 mm for garter section 4 5 mm for lace section this project is knitted flat but circular needles are suggested to accommodate the increasing number of sts crochet hook - 0 75 mm for placing beads size 6 miyuki seed beads - 64 beads **techniques used**- knit purl yo k2tog k2togtbl skpo sl1-k2tog-psso kyok **special techniques** garter tab cast on picot bind off **charted instructions for lace pattern are included now to knit the shawl with written instructions** full written instructions with stitch count for every section step by step instructions for garter tab co and beaded picot bobble **photo tutorials** are also included for garter tab co and picot bobble with beads too so that it might be an easy relaxing and enjoyable project **wet blocking** instructions are also included if you have any query regarding to pattern pl email me #saviknits19@gmail com for new updates of my patterns pl visit my **instagram** account link text 1 video tutorial for picot bind off link text 2 **watch the video for intricate detailing of shawl ** link text 3 1 https //www instagram com/saviknits19 igsh=mtlzbxq2zxjpdxlhng== 2 https //youtube com/shorts/z-4lsfx1vj4 si=eel8pnjcegoigx-7 3 https //youtube com/shorts/28vgs9zo7f4 si=9pnerw-rz-rdx6ze
